amendment.description: Amendment reduces the Presido Trust Fund account by $15 million and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 381 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce Presidio Trust, Presido Trust Fund by $15,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 186 (Roll no. 70).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 186 (Roll no. 70).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Reed.
